txt.en: Deliver Krúmpug's hand to Elgur at Amdân

Elgur can be found at Amdân during the Battle of Azanulbizar in T.A. 2799.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe at Azanulbizar. You should deliver it to Elgur, a skilled taxidermist of the Landorrim.
After encountering the swift-footed goblin, Krúmpug, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.

After encountering the swift-footed goblin, Krúmpug, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.

As you inspect Krúmpug's hand, you notice he bears a crude missive of sorts written in goblin-scrawl. Much of it is illegible, but you note the mention of a \qGreat Goblin\q. This name is unfamiliar to you. Could this be referring to Azog or was this goblin sent to treat with the Orc-chieftain on behalf of another master?

You decide to bring this trophy to Elgur, a skilled taxidermist of the Landorrim, that it might be preserved once the war is ended.

'What is this now?'

Elgur inspects Krúmpug's hand and unfurls the crude missive it holds.

'The Great Goblin, eh? Aye, it could be Azog, but I wouldn't be so sure. If this war's taught us anything, it's that worse things are often hiding just out of sight. I'll make certain that Thráin sees this!'
